Class InternshipDbMgr

java.lang.Object
InternshipDbMgr
public class InternshipDbMgr extends Object
Manages the collection of Internship objects. Provides loading from CSV, retrieval, filtering, and sorting operations. Implements the singleton pattern to ensure a single shared instance.

    • setInstance

      public static void setInstance(InternshipDbMgr newInstance)
      Replace the singleton instance. Synchronized to avoid races during tests or state restoration.
      Parameters:
      newInstance - non-null InternshipDbMgr to set as the singleton
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if newInstance is null

    • get

      Retrieves an internship by its numeric ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the internship ID
      Returns:
      the matching Internship, or null if none is found

    • add

      public boolean add(Internship internship)
      Adds a new internship to the list if its ID does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship to add
      Returns:
      true if the internship was added, false if a duplicate ID exists

    • remove

      public void remove(Internship internship)
      Removes the specified internship from the list.
      Parameters:
      internship - the internship to remove

    • getAll

      public List<Internship> getAll()
      Returns all internships managed by this manager.
      Returns:
      the list of internships

    • setAll

      public void setAll(List<Internship> internshipList)

      Parameters:
      internshipList - the new list to use

    • filter

      public List<Internship> filter(InternshipAttributes filterBy, String args)
      Filters internships using a string-based criterion.
      Parameters:
      filterBy - the attribute to filter by
      args - the comparison value
      Returns:
      the list of internships that match the filter

    • filter

      public List<Internship> filter(InternshipAttributes filterBy, LocalDate date, boolean before)
      Filters internships using a date criterion.
      Parameters:
      filterBy - the attribute to filter by
      date - the date used for comparison
      before - true to filter for dates before the given date, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the list of internships that match the filter
